participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and humorous, with a passion for animals and science.
participant_1.background: I am looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work. I'm a vet student, so I can help animals and use my math and science skills in a career that I love. I am witty. I'm going to spend time with my family and friends. I start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Energetic and optimistic, with a love for teaching and humor.
participant_2.background: I keep my students on their toes by keeping my lessons engaging and energetic. I'm in an education program, and hope to teach kindergarten when I graduate. I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life. I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season. I am overall happy with life.

content.text: Good! I'm on my way to work.
What do you do for work?
That sounds fun! I'm a vet student.
Oh cool! I've always wanted to be a vet, but I don't think I could handle all the blood and gore.
It's not so bad, and it's so rewarding to help animals.
I'm sure it is! What's your favorite part of being a vet?
I love getting to know the animals and helping them feel better.
That sounds really great. I'm looking for a new home that is pet-friendly and close to my work.
That sounds nice! I'm looking for a home in the country where I can enjoy my vintage cars and the peace and quiet of the winter season.
That sounds lovely! I'm going to spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds good! I'm going to start my day with a healthy breakfast of organic granola and fruit.
That sounds delicious! I like to watch shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
That's a good way to relax. I'm witty, so I try to make people laugh as much as possible.
That's a great quality! I'm overall happy with life.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that.
